{{NCAATeamFootballSeason |Year=2009 |Team=Boston College Eagles |Image= |ImageSize= |Conference=Atlantic Coast Conference |Division=Atlantic |ShortConference=ACC |CoachRank= |APRank= |Record=8â5 |ConfRecord=5â3 |HeadCoach=[[Frank Spaziani]] |OffCoach=[[Gary Tranquill]] |DefCoach=Bill McGovern |OScheme= |DScheme= |StadiumArena=[[Alumni Stadium]] (44,500) |Champion= |BowlTourney=[[2009 Emerald Bowl|Emerald Bowl]] vs [[2009 USC Trojans football team|USC]] |BowlTourneyResult=L 13â24 }} {{2009 ACC football standings}} The '''2009 Boston College Eagles football team''' represented [[Boston College Eagles football|Boston College]] in the 2009 season as a member of the [[Atlantic Coast Conference#Divisions|Atlantic Division]] of the [[Atlantic Coast Conference]]. The Eagles were led by first-year head coach [[Frank Spaziani]]. He replaced [[Jeff Jagodzinski]] who was fired after the 2008 season. The Eagles finished the season 8â5, 5â3 in [[2009 ACC football season|ACC]] play and lost in the [[2009 Emerald Bowl|Emerald Bowl]] 24â13 against [[2009 USC Trojans football team|USC]].
==Preseason== ===Key losses=== Some of the Eagles' key losses going into the 2009 season included:<ref name="2009preview"/>
'''Offense:''' * [[Chris Crane]], QB * [[Dominique Davis]], QB, return passing leader * [[Brandon Robinson]], WR * [[Ryan Purvis]], TE * [[Cliff Ramsey]], OG
'''Defense:''' * [[Ron Brace]], DT * [[B.J. Raji]], DT * [[Robert Francois]], LB * [[Brian Toal]], LB * [[Kevin Akins]], CB * [[Paul Anderson (American football)|Paul Anderson]], SS
===Key returns=== Some of the Eagles' key returns going into the 2009 season included:<ref name="2009preview">[http://www.nationalchamps.net/2009/earlybird/teams/bostoncollege.htm 2009 Boston College Eagles Football Preview], National Champs.net, December 2008. Accessed 2009-03-31. [http://www.webcitation.org/5hYqjyyw8 Archived] 2009-06-15.</ref>
'''Offense:''' * [[James McCluskey]], FB * [[Josh Haden (American football)|Josh Haden]], RB * [[Rich Gunnell]], WR * [[Anthony Castonzo]], OT
'''Special Teams:''' * [[Ryan Quigley]], P
'''Defense:''' *[[Mike McLaughlin (American football)|Mike McLaughlin]], LB
=== Preseason news === * [[Mark Herzlich]], a rising senior [[linebacker]] who was last year's ACC Defensive Player of the Year, revealed on May 14 that he had been diagnosed with [[Ewing's sarcoma]], a [[cancer]] most commonly found in bone or soft tissue. In his statement, he indicated he was unsure what his illness would mean for his football future.<ref>{{cite news|url=http://sports.espn.go.com/ncf/news/story?id=4166736 |title=BC linebacker Herzlich fighting cancer |publisher=''ESPN.com'' |date=2009-05-14 |accessdate=2009-05-14}}</ref>
